DataElement.preferredName: Disease Response Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Disease Evaluation Performed Reason Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The text field that specifies the reason why disease evaluation is performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease Response Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Disease Evaluation Performed Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the disease response domain.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria._Executed and carried through to completion._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.
Executed and carried through to completion.
